title: Error 500 pbe
body: A while ago i received an email that said i got accepted into the PBE. I clicked on the link and i got a 500 error. i tried many things like VPNs and different devices. i still get error 500 no matter what i do. Please help me. i sent in a ticket but i doubt it was for the right error though.

replies.body: The PBE page is currently down until further notice.  It's not possible to apply or create an account until the site is fixed up.  Updates will be posted on the [PBE Status Page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  Hang tight!
Its been closed down since April 4th, will it ever come back up?
